page.title: 09Hassocks Health Centre
page.content: Hassocks Health Centre was built for members of the{community}to come and see their doctors. It was completed in 1982 for the Mid_Downs District Health Authority. It was opened on December 6th 1982. The Health Centre which stands in Windmill Avenue, is built in the style of a Roman villa. There are three doctors who work there. There are also nurses at the centre _ district nurses, health visitors and community psychyatric nurses. They are each responsible for different aspects of caring for young and old within the area. There is a treatment room that deals with minor casualties. The Centre helps with every age in the community.
